snippet: Tyler Johnson’s goal gave the Tampa Bay Lightning a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens in Game 3 of their Eastern Conference semifinal.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Tampa Bay Lightning defeats Montreal Canadiens, 2-1, to take 3-0 lead in Eastern Conference playoff series; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Johnson’s goal gave the Tampa Bay Lightning a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens in Game 3 of their Eastern Conference semifinal.

headline.print_headline: Goal With 1.1 Seconds Left Gives Lightning a 3-0 Series Lead
headline.main: Goal With 1.1 Seconds Left Gives Lightning a 3-0 Series Lead
